Since Gale Adkins has indicated he will attend the St. Louis
convention, I am asking him to act as Chairman of a Sub¬
committee to study this master list and make any changes it
feels might be necessary. For instance, there are two nom¬
inees within the first twenty names listed, both coming from
Oregon. The question on my mind is whether this is what we
really want to do. Perhaps it might be better to go to the
next name on the list and have representation from another
school.
I am not saying that this should be done, but the giUb-Committee
should discuss the matter and then act accordingly. Your
, chairman will consider minor practical changes as being final.

cluded within the first twenty names. Perhaps the matter

All of this may sound a little unfair to some members. How¬
ever, we may expect the Sub-Committee to do a good Job of

Although no meeting had been planned for St. Louis, I know
Gale will call together all members who are able to attend.
